Generic EtherCAT Slave

Generic EtherCAT Slave is a container for a Generic EtherCAT Slave connected to the EtherCAT Master on your controller.

Slave Position indicates the location of the Generic EtherCAT slave relative to the EtherCAT Master (with position 0 being the closest). For example, if you have three EtherCAT slaves all daisy-chained together off of the same EtherCAT master, the slave closest to the master will be position 0, then next slave will be position 1, and the last slave will be position 2.

View available EtherCAT Generic Slave I/O's

To view the available Generic EtherCAT Slave I/O's expand the slave-configuration-tree up to the I/O Network Variable where you can find the Inputs for ECAT Slave & Outputs of ECAT Slave.
